processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to n to examine each candidate
Inside loop: check whether the current number is a divisor and add it to sum

advice.text: Translate your loop comment into code next: you need to iterate from 1 up to n to inspect each possible divisor.
Inside that loop use a divisibility test (the modulus operation) to decide when a number is a divisor, then update sum accordingly.
Write the for-loop, perform the divisibility check and add the candidate to sum when it divides n, then print sum after the loop.
